name: Light Maze
description:
Gameplay:

You will be controlling a cube around multiple levels with varying degrees of difficulty. As you navigate, the tile underneath you will light up and stay lit until you complete the level.

Features:

  • Simple controls. Move up, down, left, or right.
  • As a tile lights up, the level lights up.
  • There are currently: 80 levels with more (maybe) planned.
  • Each level was edited by hand and no levels are the same.
  • Varying levels of difficulty.
  • Save system. Delete it too if you want.
  • R key to restart the level in case you get stuck.
  • There is no music in the game and the only sounds you'll hear are bubble popping sounds.
  • Ability to pause the game even though you're not timed (yet, maybe).

Controls:

  • WASD
  • IJKL
  • 8456 or 8426 on the Numpad
  • Arrow Keys
These are also shown in the game which you can access from the menus.

Other Keybinds:

  • P or Escape Key to pause the game.
  • R key to restart the level.

Bugs, Issues, Feedback, Suggestions, etc:

Whatever it is, please feel free go to the Community Hub Discussion section for this game and ask away.
